dmca.title: Copyrighted material hosted on your servers
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, May 11, 2007 10:50 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4049706P] Copyrighted material hosted on your servers ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyrighted material hosted on your servers Added by system at Friday, May 11 2007 03:41 pm X-MailFrom: bamahang@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri May 11 15:41:00 2007 Received: (qmail 1968 invoked by alias); 11 May 2007 20:41:00 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 1965 invoked from network); 11 May 2007 20:41:00 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 11 May 2007 20:41:00 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 11 May 2007 15:40:59 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 11 May 2007 15:40:59 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from bamahang@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Hmbv9-0005lV-AG for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 11 May 2007 15:40:59 -0500 Received: from an-out-0708.google.com ([209.85.132.246]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from bamahang@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Hmbv1-00081V-Q9 for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 11 May 2007 15:40:51 -0500 Received: by an-out-0708.google.com with SMTP id c10so264766ana for ; Fri, 11 May 2007 13:40:50 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=domainkey-signature:received:received:message-id:date:from:to:subject: mime-version:content-type; b=V8Xcs3X4xGMkDEJzfbaBIMVPQZx8BqxctonIX7zKC9LaET102gnRq1nsHf0B37kxz7G3/o 4qI39ov8+UekXb5THNMQPinyNhl+VP4uS9awduHK2rnWHt6PXVLxbo+ZSl+gd6/UZfRGn4xy PThmIJewMvBJbfarDpEDulbAYphRY= DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=nXewauQ46494rdiHXmPkaTBNErpZKScVvrYSb5b58OYorgfGFRjIJDJJYvdVXjpd43YzRQ mGvfAuKRZDUlgQ2fc0Aq5TCmaXvrSqw1EGl9+zJlOUG45HOcfo/v83p22YGpGe8YHflpLFfb F5seEXl/8FkqQyGzI8ZEuFcckIPa8= Received: by 10.100.96.9 with SMTP id t9mr2552504anb.1178916050092; Fri, 11 May 2007 13:40:50 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.100.144.2 with HTTP; Fri, 11 May 2007 13:40:49 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: Date: Fri, 11 May 2007 13:40:49 -0700 From: "Bamahang Productions" To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Copyrighted material hosted on your servers MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_24229_28616939.1178916049771" Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 209.85.132.246 as permitted sender) client-ip=209.85.132.246; envelope-from=bamahang@gmail.com; helo=an-out-0708.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 May 2007 20:40:59.0581 (UTC) FILETIME=[AEC1E6D0:01C7940C] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern, It has come to our attention that the following website: http://www.iransong.com/ hosted on your server with the IP address: IP 74.52.122.178 has made the entire music albums "Eshghe Sorat" and "Adameh Mamooli" by the band "Kiosk" available for free download: http://www.iransong.com/person/1406.htm These music albums are copyrighted by Bamahang Productions and the action taken by the administrator of the above mentioned website is in clear violation of federal copyright laws. The album is only available for sale from the following locations: http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/kiosk2 http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/kiosk All attempts to contact the administrator of this site have failed. We would appreciate your cooperation in resolving this issue as soon as possible. Regards, Bamahang Productions www.bamahang.ca info@bamahang.ca MIME element (text/html)

To whom it may concern,

It has come to our attention that the following website:

http://www.iransong.com/

hosted on your server with the IP address:

IP  74.52.122.178

has made the entire music albums "Eshghe Sorat" and "Adameh Mamooli" by the band "Kiosk" available for free download:

http://www.iransong.com/p erson/1406.htm

These music albums are copyrighted by Bamahang Productions and the action taken by the administrator of the above mentioned website is in clear violation of federal copyright laws. The album is only available for sale from the following locations:
 


http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/kiosk2
http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/kiosk
 
All attempts to contact the administrator of this site have failed. We would appreciate your cooperation in resolving this issue as soon as possible.

Regards,

Bamahang Productions


www.bamahang.ca
info@bamahang.ca

MIME element (text/plain)
